physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Grouped telangiectases on the right forearm, forming a pale erythematous patch.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Remained largely unchanged at follow-up at 2 years of age.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Erythematous macule with superimposed telangiectases on the left leg.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesion remained unchanged at last follow-up at 10 months of age.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Erythematous telangiectatic patch over an area of skin pallor on the back.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesion remained unchanged at follow-up at 1 year.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Erythematous papules and telangiectasia in the left retroauricular area.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lesion has been present from birth without any change.
